home.title: Your Data, Your Way
home.subtitle: Secure synchronization across all your devices with zero-knowledge encryption. Extend your workflow with powerful extensions from the marketplace.

encryption.title: Zero-Knowledge Encryption
encryption.description: Your data is encrypted on your device before it ever leaves. We can't read it, and neither can anyone else.

sync.title: Seamless Sync
sync.description: Real-time synchronization across all your devices. Changes sync instantly, no matter where you are.

extensions.title: Extension Marketplace
extensions.description: Discover and install extensions to customize your experience. Or build and publish your own.

marketplaceCta.title: Explore the Marketplace
marketplaceCta.description: Browse our growing collection of extensions built by the community. Find tools that enhance your productivity and workflow.

marketplace.title: Extension Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Discover extensions built by the community to enhance your haex.space experience.

publishCta.title: Build Your Own Extension
publishCta.description: Have an idea? Create and publish your own extensions to share with the community.

register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Enter your email below to create your account

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Enter your email to sign in to your account
